code: @Override public TypeInformation<Either<L, R>> createTypeInfo(Type t, Map<String, TypeInformation<?>> genericParameters) {     TypeInformation<?> leftType = genericParameters.get("L").     TypeInformation<?> rightType = genericParameters.get("R").     if (leftType == null) {         throw new InvalidTypesException("Type extraction is not possible on Either" + " type as it does not contain information about the 'left' type.").     }     if (rightType == null) {         throw new InvalidTypesException("Type extraction is not possible on Either" + " type as it does not contain information about the 'right' type.").     }     return new EitherTypeInfo(leftType, rightType). }
